Class
BackgrounDRb::DebugMaster
In: server/master_worker.rb
Parent: Object

Class wraps a logger object for debugging internal errors within server

    # File server/master_worker.rb, line 8
 8:     def initialize(log_mode)
 9:       @log_mode = log_mode
10:       if @log_mode == :foreground
11:         @logger = ::Logger.new(STDOUT)
12:       else
13:         @logger = ::Logger.new("#{RAILS_HOME}/log/backgroundrb_debug.log")
14:       end
15:     end
